questionTitle: ___ all data into electronic pulses.
anwers: Which changes the computer input unit
Changes in the computer input units

questionTitle: Acids are chemical compounds that, in water solution, have __________, a corrosive action on metals, and the ability to turn certain blue vegetable dyes red.
Alexander Graham Bell once told his family that he would rather be remembered as a teacher of the deaf ___of the telephone.
The professor's daughter taught ________ to play the guitar.
The adder is a venomous snake ________ bite may prove fatal to humans.
Jackson, Mississippi, ________ capital, is the largest city in the state.
For thousands of years, people have used vast amounts of wood for building and ________ their homes.
A college book store that sells used textbooks stocks ________ along with the new ones on the shelf under the course title.
________ gene in the human genome were more completely understood, many human diseases could be cured or prevented.
________ the best car to buy is a Mercedes Benz.
anwers: Because of its durability and economy
Because it lasts a long time, a it is very economical
Because of its durability and it is economical
Because durably and economy wise it is better than all the others

questionTitle: People who have very little technical background have ________ to understand computer language.
A bat will often spend the daylight hours ________ upside down in a tree or cave.
This university's programs ________ those of Harvard.
Warmth, moisture, and oxygen are three neces-sary requirements ________ most seedlings.
________ have captured the spirit of the conquest of America as well as James Fenimore Cooper.
The incidence of anorexia nervosa, ________, is growing in industrially advanced societies.
Research in the work place reveals that people work for many reasons ________.
Farmers look forward to ________ every summer.
anwers: be participating in the county fairs
have participated in the county fairs

questionTitle: Perspiration increases ________ vigorous exercise or hot weather.
The Baltimore American first tried to nominate Theodore Roosevelt for the Presidency ________.
anwers: when he had only twenty-eight years
when he was age twenty-eight years
